events.message: The customer called to report an auto accident involving their vehicle on a busy highway during rush hour.
After initial review, the claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords and incident details provided.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the case promptly to maintain customer satisfaction.
The customer received an acknowledgment message confirming receipt of their auto accident claim and next steps.
Requested copies of the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and any witness statements to support the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and official police reports for the accident.
Investigation into the collision circumstances and liability commenced using the provided documentation and data.
Investigation concluded confirming the other party was at fault, allowing the claim to proceed toward settlement.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on repair estimates and coverage limits.
Customer expressed satisfaction with communication and fairness of the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was formally approved after reviewing all investigation details and customer acceptance.
Payment for vehicle repairs was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account.
The auto accident claim was officially closed with no outstanding issues after full settlement and payment.
The finalized claim file was archived securely for future reference and regulatory compliance purposes.
